meanings.definition: Of or relating to the period of time following college graduation.
meanings.sent1: She pursued a postcollegiate internship to gain work experience.
meanings.sent2: The postcollegiate job market can be competitive.
meanings.sent3: After her postcollegiate travels, she settled down to start her career.
meanings.sent4: The postcollegiate transition from student to professional can be challenging.
meanings.sent5: The postcollegiate phase is a time of growth and new beginnings.

meanings.definition: A person who has completed their college education.
meanings.sent1: He was a postcollegiate looking for job opportunities.
meanings.sent2: The postcollegiate decided to pursue further studies.
meanings.sent3: The postcollegiate was excited to enter the workforce.
meanings.sent4: As a postcollegiate, she felt a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent5: The postcollegiate celebrated graduation with friends and family.
